pages.text: $(li)The Iron Horse Armor is the upgrade of the $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/leather_horse_armor)Leather Horse Armor$(/l) that you can give your tamed $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/horse)Horse$(/l).
$(li)While you have the Iron Horse Armor on your hand, just right click on your tamed Horse, then place the Iron Horse Armor in the Armor slot.
